sentences.en: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.cn: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.en: A murmur of approval passed through the crowd
sentences.cn: 人群纷纷低声称是。

sentences.en: A murmur of approval passed through the crowd.
sentences.cn: 人群纷纷低声称是。

sentences.en: A quick nod of approval would have done nicely.
sentences.cn: 要是当时立即点头同意就好了。

sentences.en: A roar of approval resounded through the Ukrainian parliament.
sentences.cn: 一片赞成声在乌克兰议会中回响。

sentences.en: Any alterations had to meet the approval of the local planning authority.
sentences.cn: 任何改建都要取得当地规划机构的批准。

sentences.en: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.cn: 需经议会批准的任命

sentences.en: At this point there were murmurings of approval from the experts.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上专家们低声赞同。

sentences.en: Children are always seeking approval from their parents.
sentences.cn: 小孩子总是期待父母的赞许。

sentences.en: Does the design meet with your approval (=  do you like it?  ) ?
sentences.cn: 这个设计你喜欢吗？

sentences.en: Her approval was of supreme importance.
sentences.cn: 她的认可是至关重要的。

sentences.en: His ideas have won widespread public approval (=  many people agree with them and think they are good  ) .
sentences.cn: 他的想法获得了公众广泛的赞同。

sentences.en: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.cn: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.en: Last November the commission gave its stamp of approval to the deal.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，委员会核准了这宗交易。

sentences.en: Livy smiled and basked in Rachel's approval.
sentences.cn: 莉薇微笑着，雷切尔的赞许令她如沐春风。

sentences.en: Ministers have put their seal of approval on the proposal.
sentences.cn: 部长们已经批准了该提案。

sentences.en: She looked to Greg for approval .
sentences.cn: 她指望格雷格同意。

sentences.en: She looked to Greg for approval.
sentences.cn: 她指望格雷格同意。

sentences.en: The audience roared its approval.
sentences.cn: 观众们大声喊着，表示赞同。

sentences.en: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.cn: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.en: The city fathers have just given final approval to a new stadium.
sentences.cn: 市政官员刚刚决定同意建立一座新体育馆。

sentences.en: The crowd howled its approval.
sentences.cn: 人群高声欢呼，以示赞同。

sentences.en: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.cn: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.en: The new proposals have won the approval of the board.
sentences.cn: 新建议得到董事会的认可.

sentences.en: The president has already given his approval to the plan.
sentences.cn: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.en: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.cn: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.en: The proposed modifications met with widespread approval.
sentences.cn: 修改提议得到了广泛的赞同。

sentences.en: The testing and approval of new drugs will be speeded up.
sentences.cn: 新药品的检测和审批速度将会加快。

sentences.en: There was a roar of approval.
sentences.cn: 响起一阵热烈的赞同声。

sentences.en: took the dress on approval.
sentences.cn: 试穿裙子

words.tran_cn: 批准；认可（approve的现在分词形式）；赞成

phrases.tran_cn: 审批流程；审批手续；批准流程
试穿：为顾客作检查和试穿的，没有义务购买
事先批准；预先审批；事前批准；事前许可；预先核准
立项；项目批准；项目许可

trans.tran_cn: 赞成，认可，通过，赞许，试用
trans.tran_en: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted
